osy-cases.Desc:
Introducing carbon tax on "Emissions Penalty" for CO2EQ.
Emissions penalty increase linearly from 25 USD/tCO2EQ, in 2020, to 100 USD/tCO2EQ by 2035.

osy-cases.Desc:
Scenario that considers a decrease in annual precipitation (implemented in the Total Technology Annual activity Upper Limit) throughout the modelling period. The decrease is not linear.
It implied the update of the land technologies water balances and crop yields, where applicable.
